    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>ILMoE</catalog>
            <entry>ILMoE1621</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Pen - Pals.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Feder - Kumpel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Crayon lecteur - Kumpel.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Pena - Pals.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Penna - Pals.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Πέννα - Pals.</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Pluma - Pals.</string>
          </title>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="en">The learners will be able to communicate in English, in writing, with people from varied cultural backgrounds.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">learning english</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">vocabulary</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">english efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">communication</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">pen pals</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Die Anfänger können, auf englisch, im Schreiben, mit 
Leuten von mannigfaltigen kulturellen Hintergründen zu verständigen.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Les étudiants pourront communiquer en anglais, dans 
l'écriture, avec des personnes des milieux culturels divers.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Os learners poderão  comunicar-se em inglês, na escrita,
com os povos dos fundos cultural variados.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">I principianti potranno comunicare in inglese, nella 
scrittura, con la gente dagli ambiti di provenienza culturali vari.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Οι αρχάριοι θα είναι σε θέση να επικοινωνήσουν σε 
αγγλικά, γράφοντας εγγράφως, με τους ανθρώπους από τα ποικίλα 
πολιτιστικά υπόβαθρα.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Los principiantes podrán comunicarse en inglés, en la 
escritura, con la gente de fondos culturales variados.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">erlernenenglisch</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Wortschatz</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">englisches efl</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>

          </keyword>
